AbstractMethod: This is an abstract method and should be implemented by a derived overload
FailedGitClone: Failed to clone the git repository from {0}
FailedRecursiveCopy: Failed to recursively copy from {0} to {1}
ProcessLogError: Error from writing to stream at %s: %s
_ProcessLogError.comment: Message printed to console when an error occurs during logging. the first %s is the path to the log file, the second %s is the error message
_LoggedProcessTerminatedWithCode.comment: Message logged to a file when a process exits. {0} is the numeric exit code the process exited with
TacoUtilsExceptionMissingcommand: Cannot find command module for command {0}
_TacoUtilsExceptionMissingcommand.commen: can find commands.json, but cannot find module referenced i.e. create.js, shouldn't happen
_CommandBadArguments.comment: Error reported when 'taco {0}' is given arguments it cannot handle. {0} is the command name and {1} is the arguments
_PackageLoaderDownloadingMessage.comment: Message printed when download and install of Cordova tools is in progress.
_PackageLoaderCordovaToolVersion.comment: Message printed when download and install of Cordova tools is in progress. {0} is the tool version or source location.
_PackageLoaderDownloadError.comment: Error reported when downloading Cordova tools {0} fails
_PackageLoaderDownloadCompletedMessage.c: Message reporting the success of Cordova tools {0} download.
_PackageLoaderInvalidPackageVersionSpeci: {0} is the package name, and {1} is the package version
PackageLoaderNpmInstallFailed: Error installing {0} via npm. See output for details.
_PackageLoaderNpmInstallFailed.comment: Message reported when npm install returns a non-zero exit code.
PackageLoaderNpmInstallFailedWithCode: Error installing {0} via npm. Exit Code: {1}. See output for details.
PackageLoaderNpmInstallFailedEaccess: Error installing {0} via npm. Exit Code: {1}. Check permissions of npm cache.
_PackageLoaderNpmInstallFailedEaccess.co: Message reported when npm install fails due to permissions
